document_data.name: Ragnor
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ragnor''' were a dangerous tribe of [[Nar (ethnicity)|Nars]] found in eastern [[Narfell]]. There were 1,900 Ragnor in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Because of their close proximity to some of the savage people of [[Rashemen]] and [[Ashanath]], the Ragnor found themselves constantly at war. They were slightly less hostile to any other outsiders they encountered.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Ragnor were found among the [[Teardrops]] of eastern Narfell.
